name: Vita Musica
description:
Keep steady of the rhythm, her heart depends on you.

A short simple rhythm game about progressing through life of a girl with a heart condition. Follow her journey through songs of her life. 

This game consist of 6 songs following through her life in sequence. In order to unlock next song or a snippet of her life in the song, play the song with score as high as possible.

All songs and art all made by myself.

This game is part of study I'm conducting for my paper. Although not obligatory, please for a moment after playing this game (after 18 minutes more or less) fill up the following survey to help my study. This survey would not take too much time, about a minute or less. Thank you for participating.

https://forms.gle/9ff4BktekJe4D9Nr9
